summary: The Indians need the Buffalo to survive and the Government has promised to keep the herds free from hunters. But Carter, of Carter and Barton, just signed a big contract for furs and ... See full summary Â»
cast: Dick Foran|Paula Stone|Craig Reynolds|Monte Blue|Carlyle Moore Jr.|Henry Otho|Jim Thorpe|Monte Montague|Don Barclay|Frank Bruno|Milton Kibbee|Tom Wilson|Bud Osborne|Nick Copeland|Smoke|Gene Alsace|Chris Willow Bird|Dick Botiller|Tom Brower|Bob Burns|Corleen Clemons|Iron Eyes Cody|Ben Corbett|William Desmond|Frank Ellis|Larry Kent|Frank McCarroll|Spec O'Donnell|Artie Ortego|Paul Panzer|Post Park|Bill Patton|Joe Phillips|Sam Rice|Cliff Saum|Tom Smith|George Sowards|Bob Woodward
title: Treachery Rides the Range
